metadata.title: CVE-2017-8421 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - low
metadata.description: The function coff_set_alignment_hook in coffcode.h in Binary FileDescriptor (BFD) library (aka libbfd), as distributed in GNU Binutils 2.28,has a memory leak vulnerability which can cause memory exhaustion inobjdump via a crafted PE file. Additional validation indump_relocs_in_section in objdump.c can resolve this.

criterions.comment: binutils: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
